Tips: Use the "Search" fields to filter the tables, click a row in the left table to populate the right table.
The left table can be sorted by Species name or the number of matchups won (default).
The right table can be sorted by %HP left at the end of the battle (default - good for optimizing potions) or time needed to reduce the pokemon to 0hp (good for optimizing for time) Check this reddit thread for an indepth explanation
Defenders:
Species Fast Special Won
Counter with:
# Species Fast Special HP %HP Time
Attackers:
Species Fast Special Won
Good against:
# Species Fast Special HP %HP Time

from mtrycz
